message.body: Dan is behind in the game like 16 min left so he is not checking his phone so i had to check for him...hope we win...I just bought a pottery barn for kid
s rug and the money would help!
Haha. Really good game. Glad all I have tondo is buy a tshirt and not contribute to the rug fund
:) Sorry about Syracuse though! I'm exhausted off to bed..even though it's a great game! Talk soon!!
